enWisdom: Justice is a merit for the ruler
The kings are [supposed to be] defenders of the religion

Wisdom: إِمَامٌ عَادِلٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ مَطَرٍ وَابِلٍ
enWisdom: A just leader is better [and more beneficial] than heavy rainfall
Justice is the better of the two policies
The best king is the just one

Wisdom: أَجَلُّ الْمُلُوكِ مَنْ مَلَكَ نَفْسَهُ وَبَسَطَ [منه‏] الْعَدْلَ
enWisdom: The most exalted of kings is one who has control over himself and spreads justice

Wisdom: إِنَّ الزُّهْدَ فِي وِلَايَةِ الظَّالِمِ بِقَدْرِ الرَّغْبَةِ فِي وِلَايَةِ الْعَادِلِ
enWisdom: Verily the renunciation of a tyrant’s reign is to the extent of the desire for the reign of a just ruler
The king’s crown is his justice

Wisdom: جَمَالُ السِّيَاسَةِ الْعَدْلُ فِي الْإِمْرَةِ وَالْعَفْوُ مَعَ الْقُدْرَةِ
enWisdom: The beauty of politics is [maintaining] justice in authority and pardoning despite having power [to punish]
The best of policies is justice
The coming to power of the just is from the necessities
The sovereignty of the great (or honourable) people is one of the best of bounties

Wisdom: دَوْلَةُ الْعَاقِلِ كَالنَّسِيبِ يَحِنُّ إِلَى الْوُصْلَةِ
enWisdom: The reign of the intelligent one is like the relative who longs to unite [with his dear ones]
The adornment of kingship is justice
The era of the just [ruler] is the best of eras

Wisdom: غَرِيزَةُ الْعَقْلِ تَحْدُو عَلَى اسْتِعْمَالِ الْعَدْلِ
enWisdom: The intrinsic nature of the intellect impels it to employ justice

Wisdom: لَيْسَ ثَوَابٌ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَعْظَمُ مِنْ ثَوَابِ السُّلْطَانِ الْعَادِلِ وَالرَّجُلِ الْمُحْسِنِ
enWisdom: There is no reward with Allah, the Glorified, greater than the reward of a just ruler and a benevolent man
The sovereignty of the honourable is one of the most beneficial gains

Wisdom: سِيَاسَةُ الْعَدْلِ ثَلَاثٌ لِينٌ فِي حَزْمٍ وَاسْتِقْصَاءٌ فِي عَدْلٍ وَإِفْضَالٌ فِي قَصْدٍ
enWisdom: The policy of justice comprises of three things: judiciousness in leniency, fairness in investigation and moderation in munificence
